data.why:
I'm working on a pTk widget called Tk::RunCommand (if the name is
    approved) and I'd like to make it available on CPAN. I also plan to
    make a widget called Tk::Textbook. It's essentially a Tk::Notebook
    with a Text widget on each page. Everything will be managed by the
    one widget. Calling a Tk::Text (or Text-based) widget method on the
    Tk::Textbook object will result in the method being passed on to the
    active Text widget.
